languages.text: {n}Пристальный взгляд дознавателя еще на мгновение задерживается на Идире, а после переходит на вас.{/n} "Вашей свиты, говорите? Тогда вернемся к моему предыдущему вопросу. С кем имею честь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Пристальный взгляд дознавателя еще на мгновение задерживается на Идире, а после переходит на вас.{/n} "Вашей свиты, говорите? Тогда вернемся к моему предыдущему вопросу. С кем имею честь?"

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "Your retinue, you say? Then let's go back to my previous question. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"
languages.original_text: {n}Пристальный взгляд дознавателя еще на мгновение задерживается на Идире, а после переходит на вас.{/n} "Вашей свиты, говорите? Тогда вернемся к моему предыдущему вопросу. С кем имею честь?"

{n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "Your retinue, you say? Then let's go back to my previous question. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

{n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "Your retinue, you say? Then let's go back to my previous question. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

languages.text: {n}审讯官的目光停留在了伊迪拉身上。片刻之后，他将目光移到了你身上。{/n}“你说，她是你的随行人员？既然如此，我们回到之前的问题吧。不知我有幸与何人交谈呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "Your retinue, you say? Then let's go back to my previous question. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}审讯官的目光停留在了伊迪拉身上。片刻之后，他将目光移到了你身上。{/n}“你说，她是你的随行人员？既然如此，我们回到之前的问题吧。不知我有幸与何人交谈呢？”

languages.text: {n}El interrogador posa su intensa mirada sobre Idira durante un momento más antes de fijarla en ti.{/n} «¿Su séquito, dice? Volvamos a mi pregunta anterior. ¿Con quién tengo el honor de hablar?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "Your retinue, you say? Then let's go back to my previous question. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador posa su intensa mirada sobre Idira durante un momento más antes de fijarla en ti.{/n} «¿Su séquito, dice? Volvamos a mi pregunta anterior. ¿Con quién tengo el honor de hablar?».

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは意味深な眼差しをしばらくイディラに向けていたが、あなたに視線を移す。{/n}「従者、とおっしゃいましたか？では先の質問に戻りましょう。お話しさせていただいているのはどちら様で？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "Your retinue, you say? Then let's go back to my previous question. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは意味深な眼差しをしばらくイディラに向けていたが、あなたに視線を移す。{/n}「従者、と言ったな？では先の質問に戻ろう。光栄にも話をさせていただける相手はどちらに？」

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur continue à observer Idira pendant quelques instants, puis il se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Votre entourage, vous dites ? Alors revenons à ma question précédente. À qui ai-je l'honneur de parler ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "Your retinue, you say? Then let's go back to my previous question. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur continue à observer Idira pendant quelques instants, puis il se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Votre entourage, vous dites ? Alors revenons à ma question précédente. À qui ai-je l'honneur de parler ? »

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator mustert Idira noch etwas länger und wendet sich dann dir zu.{/n} "Euer Gefolge, sagt Ihr? Das bringt mich zurück zu meiner vorherigen Frage. Mit wem habe ich die Ehre?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "Your retinue, you say? Then let's go back to my previous question. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator mustert Idira noch etwas länger und wendet sich dann dir zu.{/n} "Euer Gefolge, sagt Ihr? Das bringt mich zurück zu meiner vorherigen Frage. Mit wem habe ich die Ehre?"

languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "Your retinue, you say? Then let's go back to my previous question. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, dik bakışlarını bir süre daha İdira'da tutup sonrasında sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Maiyetinizde demek. O hâlde evvelki soruma dönelim. Kiminle konuşma şerefine nail oluyorum?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "Your retinue, you say? Then let's go back to my previous question. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu, dik bakışlarını bir süre daha İdira'da tutup sonrasında sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Maiyetinizde demek. O hâlde evvelki soruma dönelim. Kiminle konuşma şerefine nail oluyorum?"
